body.name: 360 Degree Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, 2.4GHz & 5GHz WiFi Light Bulb Camera, 1080p Indoor for Home Camera System, Motion Detection, Two-Way Audio (2PCS)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 39 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Dual-Band 2.4GHz & 5GHz WiFi connects this light bulb camera to your home network for smooth remote viewing
1080P HD video with night vision provides clear footage day and night
Motion activated alerts let you know when movement is detected
Easy installation using existing light bulb socket, no wiring needed
Two-way audio for communicating through the app
IP65 weatherproof rating for indoor/outdoor use

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.4 3.4 out of 5 stars 2,497 ratings 3.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product parameter: Night vision range: 10-15 meters Support factors: for IOS, for Android 4.0 or above PTZ angle: horizontal 355° vertical 60° Function: motion detection/voice intercom/infrared mode automatic switching Audio parameters: built-in microphone/speaker Wireless network: support wifi wireless network pruduct size：17.5x6.5cm

Easy wireless installation:This camera can be installed with an ordinary E27 bulb base (110V~240V) without additional installation steps. Then you only need to connect the camera system to the router, open the application and set the camera minutes in it. Remote viewing and night vision: Our camera can control the viewing angle through APP, you can remotely view it anytime and anywhere through for iPhone/for Android for phone/for Ipad, you can see clear images even in complete darkness. Motion detection and real-time alarm: This pan-and-billiard surveillance camera uses a highly sensitive motion sensor. Once connected to the Internet, the camera detects the movement of an object, it will record the motion picture and notify you through the APP.

Two-way audio: Built-in microphone and speaker. You can talk with your family anytime and anywhere. Horizontal 355° Vertical 60°: You can control the camera's viewing angle through the APP to achieve 360-degree viewing without blind spots. Full color day and night: Day and night modes auto switch. Even in darkness,light bulb camera can return a clear images. you also can set full color night vision-on manually.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to install and works well
reviews.reviewText: I got these to be able to check the back and side yard of the house when we're away or I don't want to go outside... We have a little garden and occasionally animals will help themselves to our veggies... We have a monitored home security system and it works great but these can be moved and used anywhere there's a plug in and can connect to the router.These were so easy to install and test out. I would not use them where they might get rained on outside but on a back porch or from a screened in sun room it works fine. I liked that I could scan and turn it easy to see different angles. The one thing I did not count on is one place I wanted to put one was a bit too far from the router so it had problems connecting to the internet. Nothing wrong with the camera at all, just distance issue and I have a wifi extender/booster I believe I can use. I tested one out in the living room and thought heck I could use that in any room if we were not home and I wanted to check on things in an open area.. use it when I wanted to or needed and move it to another room anytime.. so easy. I planned to put one at our entryway so I can see who is coming by. I also want to put one in my husband's shop so I can check on him or know when he's in there working, or in the garage to know when someone pulls in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Biggest ripoff scam I’ve ever encountered!
reviews.reviewText: By the time you are sent alert whatever or whoever the intruder is is long gone. So you try to watch the playback off the expensive SD card you bought and all it does is keep throwing up a banner that says if you want to watch full videos you have to purchase their premium cloud feature.UPDATE!!!This thing is junk! It constantly turns to wall and does nothing cause it’s pointed at a brick wall! If I try to play back activity, it either says that no video is available or to check my network cause it can’t connect to camera! Even though I was connected to camera right before tapping activity icon! I even signed up for their cloud for a month with same results! I get alert notifications and it won’t show those videos either! If I tap alerts from profile tab that has a red dot lit up on it, when I tap alerts it says no alerts at this time! I check my connectivity and it says excellent! So basically you are giving up your porchlite for this thing to waste a whole lot of your time and all it does is allow you to remotely see a delayed live feed ! I don’t know anyone that is going to monitor a security camera 24/7 cause you won’t be able to play back anything recorded on SD card or play back alerts with cloud fee paid service even. To top it all off , in order to call and get some customer service, you have to pay for cloud to be able to call customer service! This company is a bunch of crooks and I wouldn’t be surprised if they weren’t using your cameras feed to monitor you rather than you monitor a would be burglars! Don’t buy this junk! Save yourselves the brain damage, waste of time and money! Zero customer service and the most infuriating piece of junk you will ever come across! I would give -5 stars if I could! Fraud at its finest here folks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Installs fairly easy but......
reviews.reviewText: This is the second camera in less than a year. The first one just stopped working and the second one will only rotate to the wall. I can no longer move the camera. Operationally no good. I don't think I want to buy a third that's just throwing out my money. Granted they are not super expensive but with today's economy I can't afford to keep replacing them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: IF YOU single women live alone .. get this camera !!! Affordable price and easy to install.. peeping tom or creepy neighbors you have solved !!! The camera will sent you notification for every movement .. like even the leaf movement.. and for 4.99 a month recorded 7 days straight the movement!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What memory card is recommended for this device?
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I have questions but the question bar isn’t there so I’ll just leave a full review in the meantime.I like the simplicity of this camera it was basically screw it in and it worked, except it actually took about an hour of trying a meal break and another 20-30 minutes to get it to connect properly but once it’s on it’s on!The issue I’m having with it now because obviously I’m not getting a subscription for it I bought a memory card. But it says the (new) memory card must be formatted in order to maybe work. Still tries to get me to subscribe to a monthly fee every time I go into the app to just see what’s going on outside.So to get to my question is there a specific memory card I have to buy for it to work? I will try formatting the one I have but I’ve never had this issue with other devices.I know there’s really no way for me to get a response out of this review but maybe the seller could update the description of the item with a memory card that is best suited for this particular camera. I will update on wether formatting worked. The memory card I got is a ONN brand 128gb and it’s not working properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No motion control
reviews.reviewText: This item is a manual camera that is not available to view any actual sensored object activity unless you manually go move the camera’s directions yourself. The App will show advertisements instead of someone trying to break and enter your home. It randomly alerts 6 mins of nothing and advertising buy iCloud subscription and gives a corrupt notification if you try to use a San disc recovery method. What a piece of junk. Won’t recommend anyone waste their cash on this crap.
